scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build: npm run prepare:server && npm run build:electron
scripts.package: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:electron && electron-builder
scripts.check-git: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); try { const status = execSync('git status --porcelain', {encoding: 'utf8'}); if (status.trim()) { console.error('Working directory not clean'); process.exit(1); } const branch = execSync('git branch --show-current', {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim(); if (branch !== 'master') { console.error('Not on master branch'); process.exit(1); } } catch (e) { console.error('Git check failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.check-server-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('../server/build')) { console.error('Server not built. Run: cd ../server && npm run build-release'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.bump: npm run check-git && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.commit-version: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); execSync('git add package.json package-lock.json', {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('git commit -m \"bump kanban version to ' + pkg.version + '\"', {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.release: npm run check-server-build && npm run package && npm run bump && npm run commit-version && npm run tag
